summary: This script continuously attempts to install pytesseract using pip3 and breaks the loop if installation is successful.

details.comment: This script continuously attempts to install pytesseract using pip3 and breaks the loop if installation is successful.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
while true
do
	pip3 install pytesseract
	if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
                break
	fi
done
